original_text: He must manage his own family well and see that his children obey him, and he must do so in a manner worthy of full respect.
korean_text: 자기 집을 잘 다스려 자녀들로 모든 공손함으로 복종하게 하는 자라야 할지며

sentences.original_text: He must manage his own family well
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기 가정을 잘 다스려야 합니다

sentences.original_text: and see that his children obey him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자기 아이들이 그에게 순종하는지 확인해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: in a manner worthy of full respect
